description: The underlying cause of issues related to the recent Chrome update stems from user profiles not being correctly loaded or created during the update process. For users who were logged in, a simple profile re-addition resolves the issue, highlighting that their data was not lost but rather the profile was not recognized post-update. In cases where users were not signed in, retrieval of user data becomes essential, pointing to profile management issues tied to the update. Particularly, paths under the localappdata directory indicate where user data resides and must be checked to restore functionality. This problem seems to impact multiple Chrome variants, suggesting a broader misconfiguration tied to the latest release's interaction with user profile management.
